name: Torrentio Enhanced
description: Provides torrent streams from scraped torrent providers. Currently supports YTS(+), EZTV(+), RARBG(+), 1337x(+), ThePirateBay(+), KickassTorrents(+), TorrentGalaxy(+), MagnetDL(+), HorribleSubs(+), NyaaSi(+), TokyoTosho(+), AniDex(+), Rutor(+), Rutracker(+), Comando(+), BluDV(+), MicoLeaoDublado(+), Torrent9(+), ilCorSaRoNeRo(+), MejorTorrent(+), Wolfmax4k(+), Cinecalidad(+), BestTorrents(+), EXTRA Torrent(+), LimeTorrents(+), TorrentFunk(+), Zooqle(+). To configure providers, RealDebrid/Premiumize/AllDebrid/DebridLink/EasyDebrid/Offcloud/TorBox/Put.io support and other settings visit https://torrentio.strem.fun
